import React from 'react' export default function Introduction() { return (

This is a tool to help people take ownership over their mental health. It uses the teachings of David D. Burns, a psychiatrist and author of "Feeling Good: The New Mood Therapy". The main idea is that many of our thoughts contain various cognitive distortions. To put things in perspective, we can become aware of our thoughts and which distortions show up often for us. Then, by writing the thought down and becoming aware of the cognitive distortions present, the person is empowered to rewrite the thought in a way that puts life in perspective. This practice of writing an unrealistic thought, idenitifying cognitive distortions, and rewriting the thought in a more reasonable way can help retrain a person's mind. This self-talk helper is a tool to help individuals take ownership over their mental health in this way.

) }
